name: Kronchy
description: This is my first game that I created during my first semester at college. It is a basic platformer inspired by retro games. Kronchy is a game about a small robot trying to rid the world of evil triangles. My experience with coding is limited but I have studied game design from Extra Credits and Game Maker's Tool Kit for years. This project is complete aside from bug fixes. I know that I could make the game better with the knowledge I have gained making it, but that would require a complete re-do and I would prefer to focus on my next game. I hope you enjoy this small learning project.
